question:
Who was/ were the founders of Rahanumai Mazdayasanan Sabha?
1. Dadabhai Naoroji
2. J.B. Wacha
3. S.S. Bangali
4. Naoroji Furdonji
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Rahanumai Mazdayasanan Sabha was founded in 1851. It was founded by J.B. Wacha, Naoroji Furdonji, Dadabhai Naoroji and S.S. Bangali. Its main objective was conducting social reforms of the Parsis. The weekly magazine of this organization was "Rast Goftar" or the Voice of Truth.
